<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get user custom field values"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/custom-fields/users/values"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a paginated list of user custom field values across all users. Use this endpoint to query custom field values with filtering and pagination.

**Key Behavior**:
- Returns custom field values from all users the authenticated user has access to
- Supports pagination via `$s` (page size) and `$p` (page index) query parameters
- Supports filtering via `$filter` query parameter (refer to custom filter documentation)
- Default sort order is by CustomFieldTypeId ascending

**Use Cases**:
- Bulk export of custom field values for reporting
- Finding all users with a specific custom field value
- Auditing custom field usage across users

**Workflow Example**:
1. Call [GET /api/v1.0/custom-fields/users/values](/docs/api/custom-fields/get-user-custom-field-values) with `$s` and `$p` query parameters for pagination
2. To filter by custom field type: Use `$filter` query parameter with CustomFieldTypeId

**Minimal Required Fields**: None (uses defaults)

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"$s","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Number of records per page","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1},"example":100},{"name":"$p","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Zero-based page index to retrieve","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0},"example":0},{"name":"$filter","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Filter expression for custom field values","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
